name: 2 in 1 Hot Air Rework Soldering Iron Station Kit, Precision Circuit Board Soldering Gun Kit, Rapid Heat up Solder Station, Upgrade Dual System Independent Control, Auto Sleep & Calibration
short_description: ADVANCED 2-IN-1 SYSTEM: The solder station and the hot air rework station are integrated into one compact body, which greatly saves your workspace. Advanced dual switch design allows for independent control and safe use, providing you with the best price/performance ratio, giving you the functionality of two machines for the price of one

HIGH PERFORMANCE: This professional soldering station is up to 700W high power to heat up the soldering iron quickly. The transformer is wound from pure copper for better conductivity, making your soldering work more efficient. Superior heating core ensures a longer service life

ACCURATE TEMPERATURE CONTROL: This soldering iron station allows for precise temperature adjustment of the iron (392°F–896°F) with an intuitive knob scale. A clear digital display provides real-time temperature readings for the hot air gun (212°F–896°F), ensuring you stay in complete control. This feature enables real-time temperature monitoring, helping you achieve the accuracy your work demands. Special note: The digital display only shows the temperature of the hot air gun

WIDE APPLICATION: This micro soldering kit incorporates a wide range of important features for soldering, including °C to °F conversion, temperature auto-calibration, auto-sleep, LED digital display, and more. Whether it is cell phone repair, computer repair, electronic component soldering, or home appliance repair, this tool can be used very effectively. It is highly suitable for professional soldering workers and soldering enthusiasts

TEMPERATURE CALIBRATION: If the temperature is insufficient, please calibrate as follows: For a soldering iron that isn't hot enough, insert a Phillips screwdriver into the “CAL” calibration hole on the control panel and rotate it clockwise to maximum. For a hot air gun that isn’t heating adequately, press and hold the temperature reduction button (downward symbol) on the control panel. While holding it down, turn on the switch for the hot air gun beneath the control panel. When “CAL” appears on screen, release the button; “000” will then display. You can now use both temperature adjustment buttons of the heat gun to calibrate within a range of “-99°C to 99°C”

WARM TIPS: If the soldering tips can not be fixed, you can gently tap around the chuck flange, you can firmly fix the soldering tips on the chuck. Digital display only shows the temperature of the hot air gun, will not show the temperature of the iron
WHAT YOU GET: The soldering-iron kit includes the 2 in 1 solder station, 5 soldering tips, 3 hot air nozzles, 1 roll of lead-free solder wire (30g), 1 desoldering pump, 1 cleaning sponge, 1 tweezers

name: Soldering Gun Kit - Soldering Iron Kit with Adjustable Temp 180-520°C,ON/OFF Button,80W LED Digital Internal Heat Soldering Gun,Auto Send Tin Soldering Kit for Electronics Welding Repair DIY
short_description: 【LED Display & Adjustable Temp】This 80W 110V digital display soldering gun of soldering iron kit can precisely adjust the temperature within the range of 180-520°C for specific solder iron welding tasks. Our digital solder gun comes with a memory function, so it will display the temperature you previously adjusted the next time you turn it on. The non-slip handle of soldering gun conforms to ergonomics, ensuring comfortable operation and making it the best assistant for portable soldering iron.

【Internal Heating】The internal heating soldering gun in our soldering iron kit provides precise and localized heating since the heat is generated directly inside the metal components. Soldering gun kit allows for better control of the soldering process and reduces the risk of overheating or damaging adjacent parts. Compared to external heating electric soldering iron, the internal heating solder gun exerts minimal thermal stress on the surrounding materials because the heat is generated inside the metal itself. This is particularly advantageous when soldering delicate or heat-sensitive components.

【Detachable Stand and Side Door】The upgraded soldering gun in soldering kit for electronics comes with a detachable stand, keep it upright when not in use, Prevent accidental burns or damage to surfaces and reduces the reflow of solder after using the solder gun, thereby prolonging its lifespan. Our soldering tools is designed to meet the requirements of your daily work and hobbies, making it an ideal and perfect assistant for connecting components. The brand new soldering gun kit uses the side door disassembly design, you can clearly see the internal operation and easily replace the heating core, check the operation of the gear, and let the soldering tools use normally without burden

【8 in 1 soldering iron kit】The soldering kit for electronics comes with 1 soldering gun, 1 desoldering pump, 2 soldering iron tips, 2 tweezers, and 2 solder wire. The natural mica heating core allows the soldering iron to heat up faster, is replaceable, easy to assemble and disassemble, and performs well in various soldering irons needs. Unlike external heating solder guns, the internal heating soldering kit does not have a heated tip. This eliminates the risk of tip oxidation, ensuring a longer lifespan for the soldering tools.

【Our Service】: We provide three years of quality for our soldering tools, Our official will serve you within 24 hours whenever you have question about soldering iron kit, and you can return back to Amazon and take back your money if meet any quality problem, no worry about waste the money!

name: TOAUTO DS90 Soldering Station-°F & °C Dual Digital Display Soldering Iron Station Kit,90W Soldering Iron,302℉- 842℉ Temperature, Anti-Static & Grounding Wire, Auto Standby & Sleep,5 Solder Tips, Blue
short_description: 【UPGRADED VERSION-NEW REMOVE STATIC DESIGN & DUAL DIGITAL DISPLAY】 Upgraded to NEW Blue Version DS-90W for orders after March 7, 2022. The TOAUTO DS90 soldering station has a PATENTED UNIQUE grounding wire design & remove-static sheet, letting you focus on desoldering safely. Adding °F / °C dual digital display function, and the LED dual-color dual-row design mode selection is more intuitive, letting you no longer be confused by numbers.

【FAST HEATING & AUTO STANDBY SLEEP】DS90 Soldering Station uses a 90W High power ceramic heating core, heats up quickly, a soldering temperature of 590 °F is reached after about 5 seconds. When not used for 10 minutes, the soldering station automatically enters standby mode, when not used for 20 minutes, it will automatically enter sleep mode. Protecting you, your kids, and your pets from getting hurt.

【INTELLIGENT TEMPERATURE CONTROL】DS90 desoldering station adopts the high-end precision PID program, can monitor and correct the actual temperatures at high speed with fast temperature compensation to provide the accuracy that your projects ask for. In the temperature lock mode, constant temperature operation can be guaranteed.

【MULTIPLE SCENARIOS-IDEAL CHOICE】The upgraded DS90 desoldering station is designed for beginners and experts to provide you with a consistent welding experience.DS90 soldering station is ESD, CE, FCC, RoHS certified safety in use, can be used for PCB / SMD / SMT welding， it is ideal for industry and manufacturing, school laboratory, home, and hobby use, electronic DIY, and repair.

【LUXURIOUS 13-In-1 SOLDERING KIT】Upgraded TOAUTO DS90 Watt Soldering Station with 5 x Additional Soldering Tip,1x Bracket for solder On The Side,1x Roll of Lead-free Solder Wire(30g),1x Solder Sucker,1x Anti-static Tweezers,1x Brass Tip Cleaner, 1x Cleaning Sponge,1x Instruction Manual.TOAUTO will be provided for a 1-year warranty after-sales and lifetime technical support, and a 30-day return.

name: IRODA SolderPro 50K Butane Soldering Iron Kit 4-in-1 Cordless 30-70W Professional 18s Heat-Up Multi-Tool with Case
short_description: INSTANT START, NO WAITING – Piezo ignition fires up in 18 seconds, ready to work. Perfect for automotive repairs, electronics troubleshooting, and field work where electrical outlets aren't available.

ONE TOOL, FOUR FUNCTIONS – Switch between soldering iron, micro torch, heat gun, and hot-air blower by swapping tips. Handle everything from circuit board repairs to heat-shrink tubing and plastic welding.
40 MINUTES OF CONTINUOUS WORK – Large butane reservoir keeps you working longer between refills. Temperature range of 752-932°F handles delicate jewelry work to heavy automotive wire repairs.
BUILT FOR PORTABILITY – Compact cordless design fits in toolboxes and work bags. Metal construction withstands shop environments. Quick 10-second butane refill gets you back to work fast.
PROFESSIONAL COMPLETE KIT – Includes conical and chisel soldering tips, hot-air nozzle, heat deflector, wrench, and protective case. Backed by IRODA's 35+ years of precision tool manufacturing.
